main event: A small light-colored oval object, possibly dull white, was observed moving in a straight course at constant speed.
interesting points: The object showed a slight increase in brightness momentarily during the observation., The object could not be definitely identified but was possibly a meteor., The sighting was made by a ground observer., The object was described as having no discernible markings or structure., Two independent witnesses on board a ship observed a larger greenish light moving rapidly in the sky.
witness description: independent witnesses on board a ship
